t: Amazon enters Shanghai free trade zone to boost offering in China | Reuters
s: August 20, 2014 - Amazon.com will set up shop in China's Shanghai free trade zone, the company said on Wednesday, aiming to take advantage of less stringent trade regulations to sell a wider range of products in the country.
